channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello
item.description: Install Hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ brew install hugo In github create two repos blog and username.github.io Clone blog at your local computer cd blog hugo new site doctopus Creates a doctopus folder inside blog/ Doctopus folder will have the boilerplate folders Since the blog folder is cloned git is already init in it. Install the theme of choice as a submodule in the themes folder git submodule add https://github.com/xxx/hugo-theme.git themes/hugo-theme Notice that this folder was added as a submodule so it can not be deleted.
